response.overview: Inspirational footage capturing this once in a generation moment in NYC, when WorldPride came to the United States for the very first time to commemorate the Stonewall Riots 50th anniversary. Rare footage from the 60s, 70s, 80s, 90s, and 2019 will help to answer questions such as, “Who in our community ultimately got left behind? Why did this happen? What are the lasting effects, and how do we resolve them?”
response.title: Humans of Pride
